title: The Elusive Cow
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Ovo, American, Organic, Beer/Wine, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A cozy cafe 5 minutes south of downtown Cincinnati at the northern border of Ohio. Offers numerous vegan choices including tempeh sliders, falafel pita with dairy free tatziki sauce, vegan chili, veggie burger, veggie wrap, portabella sandwich, soft veggie tacos, and 2 large organic salads. Vegan cheese is also available. Has a separate section titled vegetarian sandwiches, of which all appear to be vegan; vegans please ask about the bun.
